backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all backend data types (UserProfile, Listing, Community, Event, Message) and state maps for a student platform called UniShare, with mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two implemented features: fixing footer visibility on mobile in Layout.tsx and updating the logo in AboutPage.tsx to match the Navbar logo lockup.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose and key implementation details, serving as a reference for the frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file importing Tailwind directives and defining CSS custom properties for the light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app with the page title set to 'UniShare' and a root div where the app mounts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all application routes (home, marketplace, communities, events, profile, about) wrapped in ThemeProvider and QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/components/BottomTabBar.tsx: Mobile-only fixed bottom navigation bar with four tabs (Home, Market, Groups, Events) that highlights the active route.
frontend/src/components/communities/Comm: Card component that displays a community's cover image, category badge, privacy status, name, description, member count, and city as a navigable link.
Filter bar for communities providing a category dropdown and a city text input to narrow community listings.
frontend/src/components/communities/Crea: Modal form for creating a new community with fields for name, description, category, college, city, visibility, and an optional cover image upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/communities/Memb: Card component that renders a list of community members by fetching each member's profile by principal and displaying their avatar, name, and college.
frontend/src/components/communities/Pend: Card panel showing pending community join requests, allowing admins to approve individual members with a button that calls the approveMember mutation.
frontend/src/components/events/EventCard: Renders a card UI for a single event with category badge, date, venue, college, and organizer info, linking to the event detail page. Highlights platform-organized events with a special badge and ring style.
frontend/src/components/events/EventFilt: Provides a filter bar for events with a category dropdown and city text input, calling an onChange callback with the updated EventFilter object.
frontend/src/components/events/PostEvent: Modal dialog form for creating a new event, collecting title, description, category, venue, date, and registration link, then submitting via the useCreateEvent mutation.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell component rendering the Navbar, main content area, BottomTabBar, and a footer visible on all screen sizes with the UniShare icon+wordmark brand lockup and social links.
frontend/src/components/marketplace/List: Renders a marketplace listing card with an optional image, price, category badge, listing type, city, and seller name, linking to the listing detail page.
frontend/src/components/marketplace/Mark: Sidebar filter panel for marketplace listings supporting category, transaction type, area scope, and city filters via dropdowns and a text input.
frontend/src/components/marketplace/Post: Modal form for creating a new marketplace listing with fields for title, description, category, type, price, location, and an optional image upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with logo, desktop nav links, and an auth section that handles Internet Identity login/logout via a dropdown menu and mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time users to set up their profile, collecting name, college, city, course, year, interests, and social links, with auto-detected city via geolocation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profiles, listings, communities, events, and messaging, wrapping actor calls with useQuery and useMutation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines CSS custom properties for a teal/amber academic color palette in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static informational page describing UniShare's features (Marketplace, Communities, Events, Profile, Location) with step-by-step guides and an FAQ accordion.
frontend/src/pages/CommunitiesPage.tsx: Page component for browsing and managing communities, supporting search, category/city filtering, tabbed all/my-communities views, and a modal for creating new communities.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityDetailPage.t: Displays detailed information about a single community including members, pending requests, and join/request actions. Handles creator/member/pending state checks and shows appropriate UI based on the current user's relationship to the community.
frontend/src/pages/EventDetailPage.tsx: Renders a detailed view of a single event with image, metadata, and registration functionality. Distinguishes between platform-official and user-created events and handles registration state for the logged-in user.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Lists all events with search, filter, and category badge controls, separating platform events from user-posted events. Authenticated users can open a modal to post new events.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero banner, live stats bar, and preview sections for recent marketplace listings, communities, and events. Links out to the main section pages.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetailPage.tsx: Shows full details of a marketplace listing including image, price, category, and status badges. Listing owners can update the listing status (e.g., mark as sold) directly from this page.
frontend/src/pages/MarketplacePage.tsx: React page for browsing and posting marketplace listings, featuring search, active filter badges, a filter panel, and a post listing modal gated behind authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: React page displaying the authenticated user's profile, including avatar upload, editable profile details, and tabs for their listings and joined communities; shows a login prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing helper functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens (teal, amber, semantic UI colors), border radii, box shadows, and fade/accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 13) describing the UniShare university app's features, architecture, known UI bugs, and existing implemented feature list for build planning.
